titleStmt.title: 'E 'Anothen sophia, or, The properties of heavenly wisdom in a sermon preached at the last assizes, held at Shrewsbury, in the county of Salop / by Dr. Matthew Fowler ...
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Matthew, 1617 or 18-1683.

notesStmt.note: First three words of title transliterated from Greek.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
